title: Ticket #5661: Statistics and Ads
description:
Neither Jaime nor I believe that we currently document the existence of ads from the grid manager (the grid resource ad); it seems like these should be listed in Appendix A.

As a result, I will be adding information about the statistics (metrics) published by the grid manager for the EC2 GAHP to the EC2 section. While this make sense, it seems like it should also be mentioned in a list of advertised metrics and/or the list of grid resource ad attributes.

Additionally, while we have a section in Appendix A for (some of the) DaemonCore statistics, we don't appear to have a section for any other possibly-shared attributes, and the section is question doesn't actually contain any information.

Jaime will also be adding some grid manager statistics about how it more-generally interacts with its GAHPs, so both of these question may soon become more relevant.
